caption:
This photograph depicts an aerial view of a city during twilight or in low light conditions, making most details slightly obscure. The lighting condition lends a muted dark palette to the entire scene.

Foreground:
The lower portion of the image features parts of a city with visible roadways highlighted by sparse streetlights. A prominent curved road or highway snakes through the lower part of the photograph, somewhat illuminated and showcasing minimal vehicular movement.

Middle ground:
The city's infrastructure includes various buildings with a few being more prominent due to their size, appearing as dark silhouettes against the dusky sky. The density of the buildings suggests a well-developed urban area.

Background:
In the distance, there is a large body of water, possibly a river, visible behind the silhouette of the city's landscape. The water body is crossed by what seems to be a bridge integrating into the city's transport network. Beyond the river, there appears to be another layer of the city or different landforms, though details are unclear due to the lighting.

Atmosphere:
The image has a hazy quality possibly due to fog, smog, or simply the condition of the light at the time the photograph was taken. This atmospheric condition adds a sense of mystery and depth to the scene.

Overall, the composition and the time of capture give the photograph a somber and subdued look, capturing the essence of a city winding down or in a state of quiet activity.
title: Smog over Louisville and Ohio River
